44.eng-name: The Book of the Merits of the Companions
44.ara-name: كتاب فضائل الصحابة رضى الله تعالى عنهم

hadiths.text: A'isha reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) during his last illness) inquired:Where I would be tomorrow, where I would be tomorrow (thinking, that the turn of 'A'isha was not very near) and when it was my turn, Allah called him to his Heavenly Home and his head was between my neck and chest

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي فَضْلِ عَائِشَةَ رضى الله تعالى عنها
chapter.eng-name: The Virtues Of 'Aishah, The Mother Of The Believers (RA)
